code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{TeamData}from'../data/CurrentTeamData';import AOS from'aos';import'aos/dist/aos.css';import{Helmet}from'react-helmet';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Team=function Team(){useEffect(function(){AOS.init();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Helmet,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("title",{children:"Team | Current Team"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("meta",{name:"description",content:""})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{id:"page-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Team"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"team",className:"team-area",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row team-items",children:TeamData.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3 single-item ","data-aos":"fade-up",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"thumb",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img-fluid",src:item.image,alt:"Thumb"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"overlay",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.bio})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"message",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"mailto:".concat(item.email),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-envelope-open"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.position})]})]})});})})})})]});};export default Team;
